msg: HBASE-8847 Filter.transform() always applies unconditionally, even when combined in a FilterList (Christophe Taton)

author: markt
msg: More unit tests for BeanNameELResolver and fix another exception handling problem identified by the new tests. Also fix a problem found with setValue where the context's isResolved property could be incorrectly set to true.
